entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 50 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
